shapes.1:
• Competing against INSEAD, IMD, London Business School across 9 APAC markets
• Cambridge Programme differentiation: Stanford-NUS faculty + strategic leadership focus
• Executive priorities: AI transformation, geopolitical complexity, sustainability
• Market fragmentation requires precision targeting + ROI proof
• Budget efficiency mandate: SGD 85K → 62 applications (SGD 1,371 CPA)
shapes.2: Investment logic: Tier-based allocation prioritizes premium markets (SG/AU/JP: 55%), growth markets (TW/TH/PH: 30%), volume markets (IN/ID/VN: 15%)

shapes.1:
C-suite executives and business unit heads (40-55) managing P&L across multinational operations. Navigating AI adoption, supply chain reconfiguration, sustainability mandates.

• Gain board-level credibility through Cambridge Programme
• Build peer network across Asia-Pacific
• Acquire actionable strategy frameworks for current challenges

• Stanford-NUS faculty authority
• Case-based learning with immediate application
• Executive network for ongoing peer exchange

• Time scarcity without clear ROI proof
• High credibility threshold for programme quality
• Application friction (multi-step forms, unclear value)

Senior directors and functional heads (35-50) positioned for C-suite advancement. Managing digital transformation or cross-functional strategy projects.

• Accelerate promotion trajectory through visible leadership development
• Close leadership skill gaps (negotiation, governance, strategic foresight)
• Justify employer sponsorship with career ROI

• Career advancement credibility
• Leadership capability upgrade
• Employer sponsorship justification materials

• Budget sensitivity varies by market (emerging markets need sponsorship proof)
• Unclear programme differentiation vs. competitors
• Application complexity without support

STAGE 1: Prospecting (60% Budget)
• Capture executive attention via LinkedIn + Google
• Messaging: AI strategy, geopolitical navigation
• CTA: Download Brochure
• Target: 620 downloads @ SGD 82.50

STAGE 2: Retargeting (30% Budget)
• Re-engage brochure downloaders + website visitors
• Messaging: Alumni outcomes, faculty, urgency
• CTA: Apply Now
• Target: 10% conversion (62 applications)

STAGE 3: Nurturing (10% Budget)
• Email sequences + LinkedIn touchpoints
• Messaging: Faculty, ROI, deadline reminders
• CTA: Complete Application
• Target: 15% email-to-application rate
shapes.2: Efficient reach via cross-platform targeting of C-suite executives + lead capture across LinkedIn and Google formats

"AI. Geopolitics. Sustainability. Leadership Demands Have Changed."

• Strategic challenges require capability beyond traditional MBA
• Cambridge delivers Stanford-NUS expertise on navigating complexity
• Tone: Authority without hyperbole
shapes.4:
"Where Asia-Pacific's Strategic Leaders Develop Capability"
• Join 200+ senior executives who upgraded strategic leadership
• 85% alumni report immediate application to initiatives
• Tone: Social proof, peer validation

"Applications Close [Date]. Secure Your Place."
• Application takes 15 minutes, response within 48 hours
• Tone: Urgency without pressure

shapes.1:
LinkedIn (55% Budget)
• Executive targeting precision via job title, seniority, industry filters
• Professional context increases ad receptivity
• Supports full-funnel engagement (Traffic, Lead Gen, Conversation Ads)
• Risk: High CPC (SGD 2.50-4.50) requires tight qualification

Google Search (25% Budget)
• Captures active intent: "executive leadership programme," "Cambridge NUS"
• Responsive Search Ads customize by keyword theme
• Risk: Limited search volume requires expanded match types

Google Performance Max (20% Budget)
• Automates placement across YouTube, Discovery, Gmail, Display
• Machine learning optimizes toward application conversion
• Risk: Requires strong asset diversity + tracking discipline
shapes.2: Multi-channel strategy reduces risk, lowers CPC per channel, and acquires broad data for optimization

shapes.1:
PROSPECTING
• LinkedIn Traffic Ad → Landing Page (Brochure CTA)
• LinkedIn Lead Gen Ad → In-Platform Form
• Google Search RSA → Landing Page
• Google Performance Max → Landing Page

RETARGETING
• LinkedIn Lead Gen Ad → In-Platform Form (Apply CTA)
• LinkedIn Conversation Ad → Messenger Flow
• Google Search RSA → Landing Page (Apply CTA)
• Performance Max Retargeting → Landing Page

NURTURING
• Email Sequence (3 emails) → Landing Page (Apply CTA)
shapes.2: USER FLOW: Prospecting → Brochure Download → Retargeting Audience → Apply → Admissions Follow-Up
